ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Scott,David Nakayama,Chris Giarrusso,Steve Scott,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hulkfu Hustle: Four of the most powerful heroes on earth are brought to the Champion's arena to fight him in a contest with the fate of the world hanging in the balance. When the Hulk and his allies fall before the Champion's might, the fate of the world rests on the shoulders of puny Banner, Rick Jones and a monkey.
Untitled: The Skrulls prepare to invade earth by taking on the guise of the famous Fantastic Four but they can't decide who will be who as everyone wants to be the Thing.
ComicInfo.Title: Hulkfu Hustle; Untitled
